channel.title: Azure on Malek Zaag
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on Malek Zaag

item.title: CI/CD pipeline with Jenkins and Argo CD
item.description: In this blog, we'll discuss how to set up a CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Argo CD.

item.title: I Deployed application on Azure Kubernetes Service
item.description: In this blog, I'll be sharing my experience of deploying an application on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

item.title: Setup nginx Ingress in cloud
item.description: In this blog, I will guide you through the process of setting up an Nginx Ingress controller in a cloud environment.

item.title: VM creation SaaS
item.description: Development of a web interface for managing and monitoring virtual machines in the Cloud In this article i m going to resume our end of year project that consists on the development of a web interface to create , manage and monitor virtual machines in the Cloud . The application will take CloudiVops as name and i will present for you the main features and the process of the development of this application
